data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Ashanti, Ghana to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ashanti, Ghana
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Ashanti, Ghana.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: There are 4,105,400 people living in the state of Ashanti. Only about 1,062,929 might be believers.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ashanti, Ghana.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab people.
Jesus, purify the 1,062,929 believers in the state of Ashanti to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,062,929 believers in Ashanti and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ashanti, Ghana so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Ashanti
location.people_groups_list: South Asian, general, Kotokoli, Larteh, Gua, Mossi, Songhai-Koyraboro
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: South Asian, general (13,000), Kotokoli (163,000), Larteh, Gua (115,000), Mossi (495,000), Songhai-Koyraboro (9,600)
